message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $100. This is still a great price for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $95 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $97.50
